entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
